episodes.synopsis: Satellizer and other Pandora battle an unexpected foe during an Alaska trip and learn they'll be helping with a project to create artificial Pandora.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Original Pandora and Evolution Pandora face off in exhibition fights in order to determine their difference in abilities.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: The E-Pandora project continues with a test of the experimental Mark IV, a drug that could make E-Pandora just as powerful as Original Pandora.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: An emergency situation develops as the Mark IV slowly changes Jina into a Nova, and Elizabeth insists that Satellizer needs to stay out of the matter.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Elizabeth leaks top-secret information to the Mably family to protect the E-Pandora. Kazuya and Satellizer visit Bali instead of returning to Japan.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Satellizer comes face-to-face with Luis, a part of her dark past she had hoped to forget.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Emotions run wild as Satellizer and Kazuya square off against Luis and Holly in an epic, decisive battle in Bali.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Furious that the Mark IV experiments are scheduled to resume, the E-Pandora girls plan to escape from the Alaskan base.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: The E-Pandora rebellion tears allegiances apart and pits Pandora comrades against each other in battle. Amelia continues to transform into a Nova.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: The in-fighting among regular Pandora rages on as the E-Pandora rebellion continues. Skills and hidden talents are revealed, as are new secrets.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: The chaos on the Alaskan base intensifies as a new Nova threat and a massive army of Maria Lancelot clones descend upon the Photon Generator.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Chiffon and the remaining Pandora girls must face the Nova threat in one final battle for humanity's future.
episodes.title: Episode 12

video.title: Freezing Vibration
video.synopsis: With Nova aliens now appearing at an overwhelming rate, the Chevalier send Satellizer, Kazuya and others to Alaska for their new E-Pandora Project.
